description:
In the heart of the Upper East Side, less than two blocks away from a Subway stop (6 Line), very close to the MET museum, Central Park, NEUE Gallery, Guggenheim, Historic Upper East district, East River.
You are going to love it because its an area full of restaurants, coffee places and culture. Our building is on top of a French Restaurant, there is a Starbucks on the corner, and a supermarket across the street. Perfect for families, couples and business trips.
name: Lots of light Upper East Side Apartment.
